name: Wrecks, Reefs & Sands Tour
description:
Snorkeling the ship wreck submerged just one half meter below the 
water surface is one of the experiences being offered in the package 
which is fantastic opportunity to swim over a vanquished warship 
slumbering under the sea. The Lusong wreck is perfect for an easy 
snorkel-supported examination of one of the many sunken WWII Japanese 
ships resting in peace in the Philippine waters.
